page.title: 05Inns_Restaurants of the area
page.content: The section of our survey has one inn THE SHIP at Morcombelake on the Northern side of the A.35 road. The building is Victorian and provides food as well as beers and spirits together with Bed and Breakfast facilities. There is parking for about a dozen cars. Some 600 metres along the A.35 in an Easterly direction and on the North side there is the restaurant The Old Sun which was once an Inn which now serves coffee, lunches and dinners. There is parking for 6 or 7 cars. Several of the bungalows and cottages on this section of the A.35 offer Bed and Breakfast accomodation for travellers and tourists passing along the road.
